Columns.Description: The name of the operation represented by this event
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The location of the server that processed the request (e.g., South Central US).
Columns.Name: Location

Columns.Description: Browser User Agent that the request was sent
Columns.Name: UserAgent

Columns.Description: UserName that was used to log into the VirtualMachine from Bastion
Columns.Name: UserName

Columns.Description: Browser IP Address that was used to log into the VirtualMachine from Bastion
Columns.Name: ClientIpAddress

Columns.Description: Browser Port Number that was used to log into the VirtualMachine from Bastion
Columns.Name: ClientPort

Columns.Description: Protocol (could be ssh or rdp) that was used to log into the VirtualMachine from Bastion
Columns.Name: Protocol

Columns.Description: ResourceID of the VirtualMachine where the Bastion was connected to
Columns.Name: TargetResourceId

Columns.Description: Additonal text that's assoicated of this event
Columns.Name: Message

Columns.Description: IP Address of VirtualMachine where the Bastion was connected to
Columns.Name: TargetVMIPAddress

Columns.Description: Timestamp (UTC) of when the Bastion Session was started
Columns.Name: SessionStartTime

Columns.Description: Timestamp (UTC) of when the Bastion Session was ended
Columns.Name: SessionEndTime

Columns.Description: Duration in milliseconds where the Bastion Session lasted (available only when the Bastion Session ended)
Columns.Name: Duration

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
